mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE cno = #{cno} AND writer = #{writer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (bno, parent_cno, comment, writer) VALUES (#{bno}, #{parentCno}, #{comment}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT cno , bno , coalesce(parent_cno, cno) AS parentCno , comment , writer , reg_date AS regDate , upd_date AS updDate FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY coalesce(parent_cno, cno), cno
